recipes.title: Apple Banana Purée
recipes.summary: A naturally sweet first purée that most babies love.
steps: Steam apple pieces until very soft (about 6–8 minutes).
Blend apple with banana and liquid until completely smooth.
Thin with more liquid as needed for stage-1 texture.
recipes.notes: Use cinnamon dusting for 8+ months for extra flavor.
recipes.alt: A small bowl of smooth apple banana purée.

recipes.title: Carrot Mash
recipes.summary: Vibrant, vitamin-rich carrots steamed and blended.
steps: Blend with water to a smooth consistency.
recipes.alt: Orange carrot purée in a baby bowl.

recipes.title: Pear & Oat Purée
recipes.summary: A fiber-friendly blend that’s gentle on tummies.
steps: Simmer oats with water for 2–3 minutes until soft.
Steam pear (optional) then blend with cooked oats to smooth.
recipes.notes: Use certified gluten-free oats if needed.

recipes.title: Pea & Mint Purée
recipes.summary: Bright green peas with a hint of refreshing mint.
steps: Boil or steam peas until very soft (3–5 minutes).
Blend peas, mint, and water until silky; strain if needed.
recipes.notes: Skip mint for very young babies if preferred.
recipes.alt: Green pea purée in a small bowl.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Purée
recipes.summary: Naturally sweet and creamy; a stage-1 classic.
steps: Bake or steam sweet potato until very tender.
Scoop flesh and blend with water or milk to desired texture.
recipes.notes: Roasting gives deeper flavor; steaming is faster.
recipes.alt: Orange sweet potato purée in a bowl.

recipes.title: Chicken & Apple Purée
recipes.summary: Iron-rich protein blended with a touch of apple.
steps: Blend chicken with steamed apple and liquid until smooth.
recipes.notes: Great source of heme iron for early eaters.
recipes.alt: A silky chicken and apple purée.
